songs.title: Bullet With Your Name on It
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
It was a full moon, you got up in my face
You ain't from around here, boy, are you?
You're digging your own grave
You don't know the pistols I've got, sweetheart
You don't know how many cowboys I've shot, I've shot

[Pre-Chorus]
I got a bullet with your name on it, boy
I got a bullet with your name on it, boy

[Chorus]
See you waiting in the back of the bar, yeah
Do you wanna dance, do you really wanna dance?
Packing anything to get me in the high, yeah
Do you wanna dance, do you really wanna dance?
Are you gonna draw, are you gonna be a man?
Do you wanna dance, do you really wanna dance?
Do you wanna dance, do you really wanna dance?

[Verse 2]
The dust began to rise, as your snakeskin boots hit the dancefloor
You tipped your hat alright, but you don't know what you're in for
Fuck you, your twenty pieces to save your life
Before you get a buckshot in your eye

[Pre-Chorus]
I got a bullet with your name on it, boy
I got a bullet with your name on it, boy

[Chorus]
See you waiting in the back of the bar, yeah
Do you wanna dance, do you really wanna dance?
Packing anything to get me in the high, yeah
Do you wanna dance, do you really wanna dance?
Are you gonna draw, are you gonna be a man?
Do you wanna dance, do you really wanna dance?
Do you wanna dance, do you really wanna

[Outro]
All of the sudden your luck
Past the barrel of my gun to my eyes
Whisper [?]
Two other people stopped
The tumble weed saloon with the full moon
Got us in the golden light
Got a test into the velvet night
Into the wild west we ride
